events.message: Customer reported an accident involving their car colliding with a tree on a rainy evening.
The claim was assigned to the 'Auto Accident' cluster after verifying keywords in the initial report.
An agent was assigned to the case to serve as the primary contact and guide the claimant through the process.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged by the insurance company.
Company requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
Customer submitted all required documents including the police report and car repair quotes as requested.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted witnesses to verify claim details.
Investigation concluded with full verification of the accident circumstances and vehicle damage assessment.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering the estimated costs for repairs and losses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the overall handling of the claim process.
The claim was approved after receipt of customer agreement on terms and final verification by the insurance team.
Payment for the approved settlement was successfully transferred to the customer's registered bank account.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the customer received the payment and signed necessary paperwork.
All claim files and documents were archived in the system for future reference and compliance purposes.
